title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Sim Update 10 beta - Please insert the game disc error
description:
Since the latest beta release of Sim Update 10 I received the famous please insert the game disc error. After going through all articles, the issue was still reproducible. Luckily there is the MSFS community which came with the resolution.

In this video I will show you how to fix the issue based on the forum post which you can find here:

https://forums.flightsimulator.com/t/please-insert-the-msfs-game-disk-with-beta-only/540595
